hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Umar.:Whenever the Prophet (ﷺ) recited the Sura which contained the prostration of recitation he used to prostrate and then, we, too, would prostrate and some of us did not find a place for prostration

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ لَمْ يَجِدْ مَوْضِعًا لِلسُّجُودِ مِنَ الزِّحَامِ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever does not find a place for prostration (with the Imam) because of overcrowding
